mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card_account_cycle_detail ( `cycle_no`, `receive_times`, `receive_amount`, `deliver_times`, `deliver_amount`, `depo_cash_times`, `depo_cash_amount`, `depo_pos_times`, `depo_pos_amount`, bank_in_times, bank_in_amount, bank_out_times, bank_out_amount, `draw_cash_times`, `draw_cash_amount`, `revenue_amount`, `firm_id`, `firm_name`, `create_time`, `modify_time` ) VALUES ( #{cycleNo}, #{receiveTimes}, #{receiveAmount}, #{deliverTimes}, #{deliverAmount}, #{depoCashTimes}, #{depoCashAmount}, #{depoPosTimes}, #{depoPosAmount}, #{bankInTimes}, #{bankInAmount}, #{bankOutTimes}, #{bankOutAmount}, #{drawCashTimes}, #{drawCashAmount}, #{revenueAmount}, #{firmId}, #{firmName}, NOW(), NOW() )
